title: Easy tabbouleh
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon coarse salt', '1 teaspoon seasoned salt', '1/4 teaspoon chilli powder', '120ml olive oil', '235ml hot water', '100g bulgur wheat', '120g freshly chopped flat-leaf parsley', '180g diced tomato', '75g diced green pepper', '65g peeled and diced cucumber', '6 green onions, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint']
